extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">warc</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
name: WARC (Web ARChive) file format
description: Web ARChive file format.  ISO 28500:2009.  Used by archival institutions to store content harvested by web crawls, for example via use of the Heritrix harvesting tool.
